data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Bumthang, Bhutan who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bumthang, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Bumthang, Bhutan.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Bumthang.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Bumthang, Bhutan to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Nupbi people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Bumthang, Bhutan.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Bumthang that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Bumthang, Bhutan. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Bumthang
location.people_groups_list: Monpa Black Mountain, Adi, Adap, Broq-Pa, Bumthangpa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Monpa Black Mountain (500), Adi (2,700), Adap (300), Broq-Pa (5,600), Bumthangpa (22,000)
